title: North America Digital Director, Womens - Sports Equipment
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. ™ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: North America Digital Director, Womens Sports Equipment   North America Digital brand is seeking a North America Digital Director, Women for our Women offense (womens running, training, and sportswear). As part of the NADB squad, you will handle defining, driving and executing key   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
